mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SURVEY_IDX DESC) RNUM, SURVEY_IDX, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(DEADLINE_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DEADLINE_DATE, SURVEY_POINT, MAXIMUM_PART, CURRENT_PART, ISREPLY, ISOPEN, SURVEY_SUBJECT, MEMBER_ID FROM SURVEY_LIST
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_LIST SET ROLE_ID = 2 WHERE MEMBER_ID= #{MEMBER_ID}
